Package com.atakmap.android.tilecapture

Class TileCapture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.tilecapture.reader.DatasetTileReader
      • com.atakmap.android.tilecapture.TileCapture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BitmapReader, Disposable
    public class TileCapture
extends DatasetTileReader
    Reads tiles from a mobile or local tileset with the intent of capturing each tile to a file

    Use with ImageryCaptureTask for asynchronous capture of map imagery
